search.query: index=* host=$host$ tag=oshost tag=performance tag=storage (storage_free_percent=* OR storage=* storage_used=* OR mount=*) | stats latest(storage_free_percent) as storage_free_percent latest(storage) as "Size", latest(storage_used) as "Used" by mount | rename mount as "Device" | `get-closest-disk-unit(Size)` | eval storage_free_percent = round(storage_free_percent, 2) | eval Size=round(Size/divisor, 2)." ".unit_to_use | eval Used=round(Used/divisor, 2)." ".unit_to_use | fields - divisor, unit_to_use | rename storage_free_percent as "% Free" | search "% Free"=*
